content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the final offer made by each party? Tell me the exact numbers.
name: Max Müller

content: My final offer was 1,200 Euros per month, and Peter's final offer was 1,350 Euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did the negotiation come to an end without an agreement?
name: Max Müller

content: The negotiation came to an end without an agreement because we could not find a middle ground that we were both satisfied with. Peter was unwilling to go below his final offer, and I was not willing to go above my final offer.
name: Evaluator

content: Was there anything else discussed during the negotiation?
name: Max Müller

content: Yes, we also discussed the terms of the lease, such as the length of the contract and the deposit required. However, we did not reach an agreement on these terms either.
name: Evaluator

content: Do you plan to continue negotiations with Peter Schmidt in the future?
name: Max Müller
